駦駦駦

駦字的基本解释

駦
téng
古同“腾”。

駦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［téng］
［《廣韻》徒登切，平登，定。］
“腾1”的繁体字。亦作“駦1”。亦作“驣1”。
(1)马奔跃，奔驰。
(2)跳跃。
(3)跨越；超越。
(4)胜过；凌驾。
(5)犹举。扬起；抬起。
(6)上升；登上。
(7)指物价上涨。
(8)水涌貌。
(9)乘，骑。
(10)传递；致。
(11)传扬；传播。
(12)闪射；呈现。
(13)蒸烤。
(14)挪动；挪移。
(15)使空出来。
(16)猛地；突然。
(17)通“媵”。送。参见“騰羞”。
(18)姓。汉《景君碑》碑阴题名有“門下督盜賊騰頌”。

駦字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駦； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1437第27
【正字通】俗騰字。

駦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
駦字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
téng
Gu Tong "Teng".
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［téng］
["Guangyun" Tu Dengqi, Ping Deng, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "腾1". Also known as "Fang 1". Also known as "驣1".
(1) The horse gallops and runs.
(2) Jump.
(3) Leap over; transcend.
(4) Overcoming; overriding.
(5) Still holding. Lift up; lift up.
(6) Ascend; ascend.
(7) Refers to rising prices.
(8) Water gushing appearance.
(9) Ride, ride.
(10) Pass; To.
(11) Propagate; spread.
(12) Flash; present.
(13) Steaming and roasting.
(14) Move; move.
(15) Make it vacant.
(16) Suddenly; suddenly.
(17) Through "Maid". give away. See "Teng Shame".
(18) Last name. In the Han Dynasty "Jingjun Stele", the stele's yin inscription is "Teng Song, the thieves under the supervision".
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【horse character department】　駦; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1437 27
【Zhengzitong】vulgar Tengzi.
Qi
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China

Korean Ming Dynasty
Qi
Name meaning
Nothing.
-
to mount, to ascend; to move, to turn out
